message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 110
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
110 
STUDY CASE. CHECKING COMPETENCY QUESTIONS (II) 
Informal CQ 
Formal CQ 
Example of answer 
Which is the main 
active ingredient 
of Frenadol®? 
# CQ3 
SELECT ?X 
WHERE 
{ 
 ?X ub:isMainActiveIngredientOf  
            ub:FrenadolSubstance . 
} 
--------------- 
| X           | 
=============== 
| Paracetamol | 
--------------- 
With which 
substances do 
Frenadol® 
interacts? 
# CQ4 
SELECT ?X 
WHERE 
{ 
 ub:FrenadolSubstance ub:interactsWith  
   ?X . 
} 
---------------- 
| X            | 
================ 
| Rifanpicin   | 
| Propranolol  | 
| Isionazid    | 
| EthylAlcohol | 
----------------
speaker: SYSTEM
